div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, Wk. of October 6, 1894. p 110.

body.p: The Chicago Home for Jewish Orphans will be formally opened tomorrow. The institution is a four-story brick structure at 3601 Vernon avenue, and has accomodations for fifty children. The house contains eighteen rooms. The plumbing is of the latest sanitary design. The house is steam-heated, and is in every way convenient for the purpose required.
